                                                                  High Crash Location (HCL) Summary (2005 - 2009) - Intersection of US Route 7 at VT Route 38 (Lower Newton St & Upper Newton St), St Albans, VT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Crash Type                                                                                                                                                     Cause of Crash
